title: Russia Test-Launches Ballistic and Cruise Missiles
sub_head: Military exercise comes amid escalating tensions between Russia and West over Ukraine
body:
MOSCOWâ€”Russia test-launched ballistic and cruise missiles in what it described as strategic deterrence exercises, a pointed reminder of its ability to wage nuclear war amid a standoff with the West over Ukraine.
President Vladimir Putin personally oversaw the launches Saturday from a command center alongside his Belarusian ally and counterpart, Alexander Lukashenko, a Kremlin pool report said.
